verbs.description: U.S. economic growth [V: could] face a challenging slowdown as the Trump Administration ’s powerful fiscal stimulus fades after two years , according to former Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke .

[ARG0: U.S. economic growth] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: face] [ARG1: a challenging slowdown] [ARGM-TMP: as the Trump Administration ’s powerful fiscal stimulus fades after two years] , [ARGM-ADV: according to former Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke] .
U.S. economic growth could face a challenging slowdown as the Trump Administration ’s powerful fiscal stimulus fades after two years , [V: according] to former Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke .
